typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmployId as string,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Country as string,
		Department as string,
		Emalid as string,
		Handphone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		EmployId as string,
		ProjectId as string,
		Assigned as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 join(source1@EmployId == source2@EmployId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 filter(Assigned=='1') ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
